attributes.action: All children to repeat a year at school. School age to now start at age 6.
attributes.additional_details: Covid 19 has had a massive impact on our children’s education they have missed out on so much due to this. If every child even nursery children was to repeat a year and school enrolment now changed to age 6 this would allow every pupil a chance to catch up. I fear for our children academically
attributes.background: Look into all children and students repeating a year of school. If every child has to do it then it will work

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566160
